title: Traffic_Congestion_Speeding_Accident_Correlation_Analysis
name: Traffic Congestion, Speeding, and Accident Correlation Analysis for Melbourne (2023)
description: Comprehensive analysis and modeling of traffic congestion, speeding incidents, and accidents in Melbourne for the year 2023. This use case involves data manipulation, exploratory data analysis, clustering, temporal analysis, correlation analysis, and initial model development to improve traffic safety and management strategies.
